In about.html, I want to take out the section “Our Mission”, move “Who We Are” to be the first section, and use this as the text for the section “Who We Are”: 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients. We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

currentFile.content:
3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
About 3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes. We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.

Our Mission

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Integrity

We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.

Client-Centric

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.

Results-Oriented

We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.

Ownership

We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.

Who We Are

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

Our Approach

We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Ready to Work with Us?

Let's discuss how 3N Consulting can help your organization achieve measurable results.

Get in Touch →
3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

LinkedIn Home About Services Contact Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers

© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.

in about.html, After the “Our Values” section, I want to put a section called “Our Story” with the same spacing between paragraphs as in the "Who We Are" section. Here is the text for “Our Story”:

3N Consulting was founded in 2023, when CEO Nick Gupta returned to Maryland after two decades of working across major cities and serving clients around the world. Motivated by a desire to strengthen local organizations and tap into the region’s deep pool of talent, he set out to build a consulting firm rooted in community impact, excellence, and integrity.

By 2024, 3N Consulting’s core team had taken shape. Since then, we have grown quarter after quarter, propelled by a clear and consistent philosophy: deliver high-quality, high-impact consulting services at rates that make world-class support accessible. This commitment enables us to compete—and win—against leading global consulting firms by combining exceptional work quality with what clients often describe as “shockingly” reasonable prices.

We have successfully delivered on every engagement to date. Clients regularly extend our partnerships into subsequent phases of work, and many of our new projects come directly from referrals. Their trust and continued support serve as the engine of our growth and a testament to the value we strive to create for every organization we work with.

currentFile.content:
3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
About 3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes. We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.

Who We Are

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients. We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Integrity

We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.

Client-Centric

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.

Results-Oriented

We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.

Ownership

We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.

Our Approach

We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Ready to Work with Us?

Let's discuss how 3N Consulting can help your organization achieve measurable results.

Get in Touch →
3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

LinkedIn Home About Services Contact Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers

© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.

content.text: In about.html, I want to take out the “Our Approach” section and instead put a section called “Our Work” with the same spacing between paragraphs. Here is the text for “Our Work”:

When 3N Consulting was founded, past clients immediately reached out to re-engage our leadership, trusting us to deliver fast, high-impact results. We consistently meet client timelines and help organizations solve their most pressing operational challenges. Our engagements have included optimizing operations and production facilities to meet rising demand, redesigning administrative and shared services for cost and productivity gains, and building centralized procurement functions that standardize purchasing and capture volume discounts.

Our client portfolio spans private equity firms, Fortune 500 companies, federal, state, and local government agencies, intergovernmental organizations, and leading higher education institutions. We have successfully delivered projects under fixed-fee, outcome-based, contingent-fee, and value-based structures. We also provide pro bono consulting services for selected causes and take pride in contributing to the Montgomery County, MD community.

currentFile.content:
3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
About 3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes. We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.

Who We Are

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients. We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Integrity

We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.

Client-Centric

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.

Results-Oriented

We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.

Ownership

We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.

Our Story

3N Consulting was founded in 2023, when CEO Nick Gupta returned to Maryland after two decades of working across major cities and serving clients around the world. Motivated by a desire to strengthen local organizations and tap into the region's deep pool of talent, he set out to build a consulting firm rooted in community impact, excellence, and integrity.

By 2024, 3N Consulting's core team had taken shape. Since then, we have grown quarter after quarter, propelled by a clear and consistent philosophy: deliver high-quality, high-impact consulting services at rates that make world-class support accessible. This commitment enables us to compete—and win—against leading global consulting firms by combining exceptional work quality with what clients often describe as "shockingly" reasonable prices.

We have successfully delivered on every engagement to date. Clients regularly extend our partnerships into subsequent phases of work, and many of our new projects come directly from referrals. Their trust and continued support serve as the engine of our growth and a testament to the value we strive to create for every organization we work with.

Our Approach

We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Ready to Work with Us?

Let's discuss how 3N Consulting can help your organization achieve measurable results.

Get in Touch →
3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

LinkedIn Home About Services Contact Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers

© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.
